# @babel/parser

> A JavaScript parser

See our website [@babel/parser](https://babeljs.io/docs/babel-parser) for more information or the [issues](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar associated with this package.

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/parser
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/parser --dev
```
